com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd

Class IDDApplicationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd.IDDApplicationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IApplicationContext

    public class IDDApplicationContext
extends Object
implements IApplicationContext
    Represents the application context of IDD and implements the IDDApplicationContext interface. This is used by IDD to pass context for every operation in IBPMAdapter.

    The user name, password and the IDD application name (dsi name) are available in the context for all operations on IBPMAdapter. The orsId and systemName is available for all operations of IBPMAdapter except doesSupportAdministration and doesSupportLineage.

    For getTaskTypePrivilege method of IBPMAdapter, the subject area and task type is set in the context.

    For update, create, executeAction and claimTask methods of IBPMAdapter, the subject area, task type and interaction ID are also set in the context by IDD. In addition, for the update method, the match rule uid is set if the task type is merge.

    See Also:
    IApplicationContext, IDDTaskType

      • getUserName

        public String getUserName()
        See the corresponding setter method for details.
        Returns:
        the user name

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName(String userName)
        Set the user name in the context. For IDD, this is the user logged into the IDD application. For merge task generation using the IBPMProcessGenerator, this is the user configured in the Hub Console during workflow engine registration.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name

      • getPassword

        public String getPassword()
        See the corresponding setter method for details.
        Returns:
        the password

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(String password)
        Set the password for the user returned by getUserName(). For IDD, this is the password of the user logged into the IDD application. For merge task generation using the IBPMProcessGenerator, this is the password configured in the Hub Console during workflow engine registration.
        Parameters:
        password - the password

      • setAffectedPrimaryRowIds

        public void setAffectedPrimaryRowIds(List<MDMTaskRecord> affectedPrimaryRowIds)
        Sets the affected primary rowids, if any. This is the list of primary object records that have been affected by the any task action. This is only available for the IBPMAdapter.executeAction(IApplicationContext, ITaskData, String) operation.
        Parameters:
        affectedPrimaryRowIds - the affected primary rowids
